AI Description: TensorFlow Probability is a library for probabilistic reasoning and statistical analysis in TensorFlow. It provides a wide range of tools for building probabilistic models using neural networks and deep learning techniques. TensorFlow Probability seamlessly integrates with TensorFlow for efficient computation and training of probabilistic models.
Core Features: Probabilistic Modeling, Statistical Analysis, Bayesian Inference, Markov Chain Monte Carlo (Mcmc), Variational Inference, Probabilistic Layers For Neural Networks
General Tags: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Probabilistic Programming, Statistical Analysis
